trans-unit.source: Represents the legend for the chart image.
trans-unit.target: Representerer forklaringen for diagrambildet.

trans-unit.source: The Legend class encapsulates all the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control's legend, and is exposed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A> collection property of the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Klassen forklaring innkapsler all funksjonalitet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontrollen for forklaring og vises ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A>samlingen-egenskapen for rotmappen <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: There can be any number of legends for a chart image.
trans-unit.target: Det kan være et antall forklaringer for en diagrambildet.

trans-unit.source: Legends can: - Be docked and aligned.
trans-unit.target: Forklaringer kan:-forankret og justert.

trans-unit.source: - Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas.
trans-unit.target: -Vises innsiden eller utsiden tegnede diagramområder.

trans-unit.source: - Automatically fit their contents.
trans-unit.target: -Tilpass automatisk innholdet.

trans-unit.source: - Use a predefined style, such as row, column or table.
trans-unit.target: -Bruke en forhåndsdefinert stil, for eksempel rad, kolonnen eller tabellen.

trans-unit.source: - Use hatching, gradient colors and background images.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk skravering, gradering farger og bakgrunn.

trans-unit.source: - Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image.
trans-unit.target: -Størrelse og plasseres hvor som helst i diagrambildet.

trans-unit.source: Legend items are represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> object, and are either default or custom items.
trans-unit.target: Forklaringselementer som representeres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>objekt, og standard eller egendefinerte elementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: Custom items are not associated with data, and can be added, deleted and modified using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinerte elementer er ikke knyttet til, kan legges til, slette og endret ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default items are by default automatically added to the legend, and are the names of the plotted data points for doughnut and pie charts.
trans-unit.target: Standard-elementer som standard automatisk legges til i forklaringen og navnene på tegnede datapunktene for hjuldiagrammer og sektor.

trans-unit.source: For all other chart types, the default items are the names of the plotted data series.
trans-unit.target: Standardelementene er navnene på tegnede dataserien for alle andre diagramtyper.

trans-unit.source: Each series has a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Legend%2A> property that defines the name of the legend that will be used.
trans-unit.target: Hver har en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Legend%2A>-egenskap som definerer navnet på forklaringen som skal brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Legend%2A>

trans-unit.source: A legend item will not be created for a series if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsVisibleInLegend%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Et forklaringselement ikke opprettes for en serie hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsVisibleInLegend%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsVisibleInLegend%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text for these default items can be changed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for standardelementene kan endres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property will allow you to specify predefined keywords that will be replaced by their appropriate values at run-time.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan du angi forhåndsdefinerte nøkkelord som vil bli erstattet av passende verdiene ved kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: If you have a pie chart and you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A> property, it will also set the legend text to the value you set for the labels.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har et sektordiagram og angir de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>egenskapen settes også forklaringsteksten til verdien du angir for etikettene.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the text to a different value, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi teksten til en annen verdi, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you would want to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> property to "#AXISLABEL" or "#VALX".
trans-unit.target: De fleste tilfeller vil du ønsker å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>til å "#AXISLABEL" eller "#VALX".</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Legend series symbols are rectangles, dots or lines.
trans-unit.target: Serien forklaringssymboler er rektangler, punktum eller linjer.

trans-unit.source: The symbol type is set automatically by the chart and depends on the plotted chart type.
trans-unit.target: Symbol-type som er angitt automatisk av diagrammet og avhenger tegnede diagramtypen.

trans-unit.source: Legend text by default is automatically sized.
trans-unit.target: Forklaringstekst som standard justeres automatisk.

trans-unit.source: You can disable automatic sizing of legend text by disabling the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deaktivere størrelse automatisk for forklaringstekst ved å deaktivere den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, the size of the legend text is determined by the Size property of the legend <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Font%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `false`, størrelsen på forklaringsteksten bestemmes av egenskapen størrelse for forklaringen <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Font%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A> property is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.AutoFitMinFontSize%2A> property determines the minimum font size that a legend item can have when resizing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>egenskapen er aktivert, den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.AutoFitMinFontSize%2A>egenskapen angir minimum skriftstørrelse som kan ha et forklaringselement når du endrer størrelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.AutoFitMinFontSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A> property defines a limit on the number of characters that can be shown on one line before text is wrapped to another line.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>definerer en grense på antall tegn som kan vises på én linje før teksten brytes til en ny linje.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not wish to wrap text in the legend, set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A> property to zero.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke ønsker å bryte tekst i forklaringen, setter du verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>egenskapen til null.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, when the entire legend text does not fit in the legend, the text will be truncated.
trans-unit.target: Som standard når hele forklaringsteksten ikke passer i forklaringen vil teksten bli avkortet.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A> on the legend to get the text to wrap instead of being truncated.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>på forklaring teksten brytes i stedet for ble avkuttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TextWrapThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the contents of the legend cannot fit into the given space, legend entries are truncated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis innholdet i forklaringen ikke kan passer inn i det angitte, avrundet forklaringsteksten.

trans-unit.source: An ellipsis will be shown to indicate that there are more entries than the legend has space for.
trans-unit.target: En ellipsen vises til å angi at det finnes flere oppføringer enn forklaringen er plass til.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the legend items from being truncated, set the position and size of the legend using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Size%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Angi plasseringen og størrelsen for legend ved hjelp av for å hindre at forklaringselementene kuttet av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Size%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: When setting the legend position or size, the chart can no longer automatically position the elements in the chart.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir plasseringen for forklaringen eller størrelsen, kan ikke lenger automatisk diagrammet plassere elementene i diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, you many need to manually position other chart elements to achieve the desired appearance.
trans-unit.target: I noen tilfeller mange må du manuelt plassere andre diagramelementer for å oppnå ønsket utseende.

trans-unit.source: Another option would be to define your own cell columns instead of using the default legend settings.
trans-unit.target: Et annet alternativ er å definere en celle kolonner i stedet for ved hjelp av standardinnstillingene for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The Legend object has a CellColumn Collection; each CellColumn object represents a column in the Legend.
trans-unit.target: FORKLARING-objektet har en CellColumn-samlingen. hvert CellColumn objekt representerer en kolonne i forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: A cell column has <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MaximumWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> properties that can be used to adjust the size of the columns.
trans-unit.target: En celle-kolonnen har <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MaximumWidth%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>Egenskaper som kan brukes til å justere størrelsen på kolonnene.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MaximumWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the legend contains many entries, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRows%2A> can be used to improve readability.
trans-unit.target: Når forklaringen inneholder mange oppføringer <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRows%2A>kan brukes til å forbedre lese.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to True, it will display a back color that you can set using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til SANN, vises en bakgrunnsfarge som kan angis ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the legend is positioned in the top-right corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er forklaringen plassert i øverst til høyre for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: This position can be modified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A> properties of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Denne posisjonen kan endres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A>Egenskaper for forklaringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>

trans-unit.source: The legend can also be associated with a chart area by use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Forklaringen kan også være knyttet til et diagramområde, ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the name of the chart area for which the legend should be docked.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir navnet på diagramområdet som forklaringen må være forankret.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> property can be used to display the legend inside a chart area.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>kan brukes til å vise forklaring i et diagramområde.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> is set to False, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.MaximumAutoSize%2A> property defines the maximum size, in percent, of the legend within the available chart when the legend is automatically positioned.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>er satt til False, den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.MaximumAutoSize%2A>definerer den maksimale størrelsen, i prosent av forklaringen i tilgjengelig diagrammet når forklaringen automatisk er plassert.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.MaximumAutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property should be set if you wish to adjust the width or height of the legend after the docking properties have been set.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må angis hvis du vil justere bredden eller høyden på forklaringen etter at forankringsplasseringen egenskapene er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The legend can be modified using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: Forklaringen kan endres via den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint"></xref> class with the specified legend name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint"> </xref> klasse angitte forklaringstekst.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: The legend can be aligned so that it is <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>, <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> or <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>; its alignment is also affected by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Forklaringen kan være justert slik at den er <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>, <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>eller <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>; justeringen også er berørt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>

trans-unit.source: If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> is to the left; if it is docked to the left or right, <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> is at the top.
trans-unit.target: Hvis forklaringen er forankret til top eller bottom, <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>er mot venstre; hvis den er forankret til venstre eller høyre <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>er øverst.</xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> property setting is just the opposite, and aligns the legend to the right or the bottom, depending on where it is docked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>egenskapsinnstillingen er motsatt og justerer forklaringen mot høyre eller nedre, avhengig av hvor den er forankret.</xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> always centers the legend, either vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>alltid datasentere forklaringen, vannrett eller loddrett.</xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>

trans-unit.source: Setting the Alignment property will have no effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen justering har ingen virkning hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>ikke settes til <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: A .NET Framework <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend.
trans-unit.target: En .NET Framework <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer justeringen for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum font size that can be used by the autofitting algorithm for the legend text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir minimum skriftstørrelse som kan brukes av algoritmen beste tilpassing av for forklaringsteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the minimum font size.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir minimum skriftstørrelse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of a legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for en forklaring.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: The BackColor value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for bakgrunnsfarge blir første fargen som brukes hvis du har angitt gradering farger for bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: The alpha value controls the opacity of a color.
trans-unit.target: Alfaverdi kontrollerer tettheten for en farge.

trans-unit.source: If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne fargen til "gjennomsiktig" – det vil si hvis du bruker en alfaverdi 0 – ingen farge som skal tilordnes til bakgrunn for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the background will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnen vil resultatet være gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the background color of a legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir bakgrunnsfargen for en forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The default color is [System.Drawing.Color.White](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er [System.Drawing.Color.White](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir retningen for bakgrunnsgraderingen for en forklaring.

trans-unit.source: Also determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om gradering brukes også.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackGradientStyle property to determine whether a legend will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen BackGradientStyle til å finne ut om en forklaring vises gradering og for å finne ut retningen på graderingen Hvis én brukes.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over tilgjengelige mønstre, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors: Set the primary color of the legend background with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruke gradering farger: Angi primær fargen på bakgrunnen forklaring med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the secondary color of the legend background with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angir den sekundære fargen for forklaring bakgrunnen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this BackGradientStyle property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen BackGradientStyle ønsket gradering stil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration that represents the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref> opplisting som representerer retningen for bakgrunnsgraderingen for en forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skravering stilen for en forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>Opplisting angir skravering mønsteret som brukes av en velgeren av typen <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: Skravering mønsteret består av en fylt bakgrunnsfarge og linjer tegnes over bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over tilgjengelige skravering maler, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: **Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** fargen på skravering linjer fastsettes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration that represents the hatching style of a legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref> opplisting som representerer skravering stilen for en forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of a legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsbildet for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: This property defines a path to a background image for a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en bane til et bakgrunnsbilde for en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>forklaring, og kan være en absolutt eller relativ URL-adresse.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: To position the image, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For å plassere bildet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi ett av fargene som bildet som "gjennomsiktig", ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: Et bilde kan er hentet fra alle gyldige filtyper som støttes av .NET Framework, inkludert ikonene.

trans-unit.source: Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunn overstyrer andre egenskaper for bakgrunn for eksempel graderingsfargen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer URL-adressen til en bildefil.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image alignment used for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> drawing mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for bakgrunnsbilde brukes det <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref> tegnemodus.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the alignment of the background image for the legend; it is only applied when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer denne egenskapen justering for bakgrunnsbilde for forklaringen. Det er bare brukt når <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageWrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the background image alignment.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer justeringen for bakgrunnsbilde for.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en farge som skal erstattes med en gjennomsiktig farge når bakgrunnsbildet tegnes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som skal vises som gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode of a legend background image.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir modus for tegning av et bakgrunnsbilde for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The BackImageWrapMode property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackImageWrapMode bestemmer hvordan bildet vises. bildet kan være side ved side, skalert og så videre.

trans-unit.source: If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et bilde skaleres, skal den strekkes for å passe i grensene for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bildet side ved side, tegnes den gjentatte ganger fra øvre venstre hjørnet på forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om de tilgjengelige wrapping modiene den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>opplisting emnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: If the BackImageWrapMode property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, the location where the image is drawn is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen BackImageWrapMode er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, bestemmes plasseringen der tegnes bildet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackImageAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value that represents the drawing mode of a legend background image.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer tegnemodus av et bakgrunnsbilde for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend background.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den sekundære fargen for en bakgrunn for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The BackSecondaryColor property determines the secondary background color of many <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackSecondaryColor angir den sekundære bakgrunnsfargen for mange <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objekter, og brukes når gradering farger brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: You can set BackSecondaryColor to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere BackSecondaryColor til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skravering brukes, angir egenskapen BackSecondaryColor fargen på linjene skravering for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for the background of a legend: - Set the primary color with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruke gradering farger for bakgrunn for forklaring:-Angi primær farge med den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the secondary color with the BackSecondaryColor property.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den sekundære fargen med egenskapen BackSecondaryColor.

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackGradientStyle%2A>egenskapen ønsket gradering stilen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi angitt for den sekundære fargen på bakgrunnen skravering eller gradering fyll.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjefargen for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the border color of a legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som Representer kantlinjefargen på en forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of a legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The BorderDashStyle property determines the line style to use for a border.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BorderDashStyle angir linjestilen skal brukes for en kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Linjen kan være fylt prikket og så videre.

trans-unit.source: For other border styles, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: For andre Kantlinjestilene, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>opplisting emnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the border style of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir kantlinjestilen for diagramelementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of a legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjetykkelsen for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: Note that BorderWidth property can also set the width of lines in such elements as line charts, custom legend items displayed with a "line" style, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at BorderWidth egenskapen kan også angi tykkelsen på linjene i elementer som linjediagram, egendefinerte elementer for forklaring vises med en "linjestilen" og så videre.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som bestemmer kantlinjetykkelsen på forklaringen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnCollection"></xref> for a legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnCollection"> </xref> for en forklaring.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnCollection"></xref> object for a legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnCollection"> </xref> objekt for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object used for custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref> objektet brukes til egendefinerte elementer for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: This collection property can be used to add, delete or modify custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen-egenskapen kan brukes til å legge til, slette eller endre egendefinerte elementer for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: Custom legend items, unlike default legend items, do not have associated series or data points.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinerte elementer for forklaring, i motsetning til forklaringselementer som standard, har ikke tilknyttede serien eller datapunktene.

trans-unit.source: To modify legend items, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre forklaringselementene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object used for custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref> objektet brukes til egendefinerte elementer for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frigi ressurser både administrerte og uforvaltede; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> where the legend will be docked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> der forklaringen er forankret.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> where this legend will be docked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> der denne forklaringen er forankret.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines where the legend is docked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer hvor forklaringen er forankret.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> can be docked to the top, left, bottom or right of either the entire chart image, or the inside or outside of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>kan være forankret til top, venstre, nederst eller til høyre for hele diagrambildet eller innenfor eller utenfor et diagramområde.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> property is set to `false`, docking applies to the entire chart image.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>er satt til `false`, forankringen gjelder for hele diagrambildet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> property is set to `true`, docking applies to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> property This property has no effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>er satt til `true`, forankringen gjelder den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>egenskapen denne egenskapen har ingen virkning hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>egenskapen er ikke satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking"></xref> enumeration value that determines where the legend is docked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som bestemmer hvor forklaringen er forankret.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the legend is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om forklaringen er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: To hide a legend, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil skjule en forklaring, angi denne egenskapen `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if legend is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forklaringen er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object, which is used to set font properties of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> -objektet som brukes til å angi skriftegenskaper for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change the properties of this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object at run time, a compilation error will occur.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å endre egenskaper for dette <xref:System.Drawing.Font>objekt ved kjøretid, skjer en kompileringsfeil.</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: To set font properties at run time, you must create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi egenskaper for skrift ved kjøretid, må du opprette en ny <xref:System.Drawing.Font>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the Legend.Font.Size property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A> property will be set to false.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du setter Legend.Font.Size-egenskapen i <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>egenskapen settes til false.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A> property to true, this property will be reset to its default, which is 8 points.
trans-unit.target: Også hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>egenskapen til SANN, denne egenskapen vil bli tilbakestilt til standard, som 8 punkt.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsTextAutoFit%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object which is used to set font properties of the legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> objektet som brukes til å angi skriftegenskaper for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på forklaringsteksten.

trans-unit.source: The ForeColor property is used to set the legend text color.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ForeColor brukes til å angi tekstfarge for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the color of the legend text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir fargen på forklaringsteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual separator type for the legend header.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den synlig skilletegntype for forklaring-hodet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the visual separator type for the legend header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer den synlig skilletegntype for forklaring-hodet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the separator for the legend header.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på skilletegnet for forklaring-hodet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the color of the separator for the legend header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir fargen på skilletegn for forklaring-hodet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the chart area in which the legend is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på diagramområdet som forklaringen tegnes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates if legend rows will be drawn with interlaced background color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som indikerer om forklaringsradene skal tegnes med sammenflettet bakgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: When the legend contains many entries, the InterlacedRows property can be used to improve readability.
trans-unit.target: Når forklaringen inneholder mange oppføringer, kan egenskapen InterlacedRows brukes til å forbedre lese.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the legend will display a background color for the rows that are interlaced, which can be set using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, forklaringen vises bakgrunnsfarge for radene som er sammenflettet, som kan angis ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRowsColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value that determines whether alternating rows in the legend are drawn with a specified color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> verdi som bestemmer om skiftende rader i forklaringen tegnes med en angitt farge.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the legend's interlaced rows.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfarge for sammenflettede rader for i forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable if interlaced rows are used.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare hvis det brukes sammenflettede rader.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the background color of the legend's interlaced rows.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir bakgrunnsfargen for forklaringen sammenflettede rader.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend is docked inside or outside the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som indikerer om forklaringen er forankret på innsiden eller utsiden diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: This property will only have an effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> property is set to the name of a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har bare en effekt hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>egenskapen er satt til navnet på en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property is set to any value other than <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>, the IsDockedInsideChartArea property also has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>settes til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>, egenskapen IsDockedInsideChartArea også har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is because the position of the legend is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Fordi posisjonen for forklaringen fastsettes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the legend is docked inside the chart area; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is docked outside the chart area.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forklaringen er forankret på innsiden av diagramområdet; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis den er forankret utenfor diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether all legend items are equally spaced.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som indikerer om alle forklaringselementene har like mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if legend items are equally spaced; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if they are not.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forklaringselementene har like mellomrom; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis de ikke.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend text is automatically sized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som indikerer om forklaringsteksten justeres automatisk.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the legend text is automatically sized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forklaringsteksten justeres automatisk; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual separator type for the legend table columns.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den synlig skilletegntype for tabellkolonner for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the visual separator type for the legend table columns.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer den synlig skilletegntype for tabellkolonner for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend table column separator.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på forklaring tabellen kolonnen skilletegnet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the color of the legend table column separator.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne fargen på forklaring tabellen kolonnen skilletegnet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the legend table column spacing.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den kolonneavstanden i forklaringstabellen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemColumnSpacing property value is calculated as a percentage of the legend text font.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien ItemColumnSpacing beregnes som en prosentdel av tekstskriften forklaring.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the table column spacing.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer den kolonneavstanden i forklaringstabellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som angir rekkefølgen som forklaringselementene vises.

trans-unit.source: This property only affects legend items automatically added for the chart series; it has no effect on custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker bare forklaringselementer som automatisk legges til i diagramserien; den har ingen effekt på egendefinerte elementer for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder>, the legend will automatically be reversed if StackedColumn, StackedColumn100, StackedArea or StackedArea100 chart types are used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder>er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder>, forklaringen automatisk reverseres relasjonsretningen Hvis StackedColumn, StackedColumn100, StackedArea eller StackedArea100 diagramtyper brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir rekkefølgen hvilken forklaring elementer som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen på forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the legend is displayed as a series of items in a table.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vises forklaringen som en rekke elementer i en tabell.

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether to expand items in the table width-wise or height-wise by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om du vil utvide elementer i tabellen width-wise eller height-wise ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control will determine whether to draw a wide table or a tall table, depending on the alignment and positioning of the chart.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontrollen fastslår om å tegne et bredt tabell eller en høyt tabell, avhengig av justeringen og plasseringen av diagrammet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.TableStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This may cause the legend to be drawn using multiple legend item columns.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan føre til forklaringen som skal tegnes med flere forklaring elementet kolonner.

trans-unit.source: There are three possible styles for a legend: Column, Row and Table.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes en forklaring tre mulige maler: kolonne, rad- og.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: ||| |-|-| |Style|Description| |Column|Legend items are displayed in one column, with multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Se tabellen nedenfor inneholder et sammendrag av disse malene: ||| |-|-| | Stilen | Beskrivelse | | Kolonnen | Forklaringselementene vises i en kolonne, med flere rader.

trans-unit.source: Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart.| |Row|Legend items are displayed in one row, with multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Mest brukte når forklaringen er forankret til venstre eller høyre for diagrammet. | | Raden | Forklaringselementene vises i én rad med flere kolonner.

trans-unit.source: Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the top or bottom of the chart.| |Table|Legend items are displayed using multiple columns and rows.|
trans-unit.target: Mest brukte når forklaringen er forankret til top eller bottom for diagrammet. | | Tabellen | Forklaringselementene vises med flere kolonner og rader. |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the legend style.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som bestemmer stilen for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the legend, measured as a percentage of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale størrelsen på forklaringen, målt i prosent av diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: This value is used by the automatic layout algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien brukes av algoritmen for automatisk oppsett.

trans-unit.source: If the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart area, this property determines the maximum width of the legend, which is measured as a percentage of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Hvis forklaringen er forankret til venstre eller høyre i diagramområdet, bestemmer denne egenskapen maksimumsbredden for forklaringen måles som en prosentdel av diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, this property determines the maximum height of the legend, which is also measured as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: Hvis forklaringen er forankret til top eller bottom, bestemmer denne egenskapen maksimalt høyden på forklaringen, som også målt i prosent.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float " name="float " href=""></xref>value that represents the maximum size of the legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_float " name="float " href=""> </xref>verdi som representerer den maksimale størrelsen på forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> object, which can be used to get or set the position of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"> </xref> objektet, som kan brukes til å hente eller angi plasseringen for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: If the Position property is automatic (that is, Legend.Position.Auto = `true`) the legend position is calculated automatically by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, taking into account the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen posisjon automatisk (det vil si Legend.Position.Auto = `true`) forklaring posisjonen beregnes automatisk ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll, tar hensyn den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>egenskapsinnstillingene.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: If it is not automatic, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> properties are ignored, and the legend position is solely determined by the value of the returned <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den ikke automatisk, i <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A>ignoreres, og plasseringen til forklaring utelukkende fastsettes av den returnerte verdien <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.IsDockedInsideChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.DockedToChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Docking%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> value that represents the position of the legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"> </xref> verdi som angir posisjonen for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Skyggefarge for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan settes til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows.
trans-unit.target: Alfaverdi kan brukes for en "realistisk" shadowing effekt. Prøv fargeverdien "128,0,0,0" for skygger.

trans-unit.source: To implement a shadow, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.ShadowOffset%2A> property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: For å implementere skygge, angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.ShadowOffset%2A>til en annen verdi enn null (0).</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.ShadowOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the shadow color of the legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som Representer skyggefargen for forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skyggeforskyvning, på forklaringen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: For å implementere skygging, kan du angi denne egenskapen til en annen verdi enn null (0).

trans-unit.source: A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi fører skygge som flytter nedover og til høyre. en negativ verdi vil føre til en skygge flytter opp og til venstre.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the legend.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som Representer skyggeforskyvning på forklaringen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the legend table style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Forklaringsstil for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.LegendStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.LegendStyle%2A>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.LegendStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the legend table style.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendTableStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir Forklaringsstil for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters that can be sequentially displayed in the legend before the text is wrapped.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antallet tegn som kan sekvensielt vises i forklaringen før teksten brytes.

trans-unit.source: When the legend text exceeds the value specified by this property, text will be automatically wrapped when the next whitespace character is encountered.
trans-unit.target: Når forklaringsteksten overstiger verdien som er angitt av denne egenskapen, står tekst automatisk når det oppstår neste mellomromstegnet.

trans-unit.source: Text will not be wrapped if there are no whitespace characters in the text.
trans-unit.target: Tekst, vil ikke brytes hvis det finnes ingen mellomromstegn i teksten.

trans-unit.source: Set the TextWrapThreshold property to zero to disable the feature.
trans-unit.target: Angi TextWrapThreshold-egenskapen til null for å deaktivere funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the number of characters that can be placed in the legend sequentially before the text is wrapped.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som Representer antall tegn som kan plasseres i forklaringen sekvensielt før teksten brytes.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 25.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 25.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the legend title text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer forklaringsteksten for tittelen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer justeringen for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfarge for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the background of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne bakgrunnsbilde for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font for the legend title.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriften for forklaring tittelen.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to set font properties of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes til å angi egenskapene for skriftstørrelsen for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change the properties of this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object at run time, a compilation error will occur.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å endre egenskaper for dette <xref:System.Drawing.Font>objekt ved kjøretid, skjer en kompileringsfeil.</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: To set font properties at run time, you must create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi egenskaper for skrift ved kjøretid, må du opprette en ny <xref:System.Drawing.Font>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object that specifies font for the legend title.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> objekt som angir skriften for forklaring tittelen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt, Bold".
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er "Microsoft Sans-Serif, 8, pkt fet".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text color of the legend title.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tekstfargen for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the title text color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne tekstfargen for tittelen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual separator type for the legend title.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den synlig skilletegntype for forklaring tittelen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> value that represents the type of separator that will be drawn below the title.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref> verdi som representerer typen skilletegn som skal tegnes nedenfor tittelen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend title separator.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på forklaring tittel skilletegnet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the color of the legend title separator.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne fargen på forklaring tittel skilletegnet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
